item.title: Welcome to our New Blog!
item.description: Welcome to the IVRPowers new blog! Our Corporate Blog is build with Hugo and will give us a unique opportunity to better share news, updates and healthy living content, while also offering a place for us to interact with all our community. If youâ€™re wondering what you can expect from the content you find on our blog, and how the information here differs from the information you may find on our website, read on.
